name: MISONR OASys SAQ Summary
description:
Last updated: 01/12/2020 - CJA 2020 sentence codes added.
OAS0027 - v1.1 This report shows a summary of OASys SAQ answers on one report tab and a detailed breakdown by individual prisoner on the second report tab.

dataset.name: Prisoners
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_CURRENT_SECURITY_CATEGORY.CURRENT_SEC_CAT_LEVEL IS NULL THEN 'Unclassified' ELSE AT_CURRENT_SECURITY_CATEGORY.CURRENT_SEC_CAT_LEVEL END AS CURRENT_SECURITY_CATEGORY, CASE WHEN DT_LIFEFLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN 'Life' WHEN SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2) = '99' THEN 'Life' WHEN FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH = '00/00/00' THEN 'No sentence' WHEN DT_LIFEFLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG IS NULL AND SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2) = '00' AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 4, 2)) < 6 THEN 'Less than 6 Months' WHEN DT_LIFEFLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG IS NULL AND SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2) = '00' AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 4, 2)) < 12 THEN '6 Months to less than 1 Year' WHEN DT_LIFEFLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG IS NULL AND SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2) <> '00' AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2)) < 2 THEN '1 Year to less than 2 Years' WHEN DT_LIFEFLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG IS NULL AND NOT SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2) IN ('00', '01') AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2)) < 3 THEN '2 Years to less than 3 Years' WHEN DT_LIFEFLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG IS NULL AND NOT SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2) IN ('00', '01', '02') AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2)) < 4 THEN '3 Years to less than 4 Years' WHEN DT_LIFEFLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG IS NULL AND NOT SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2) IN ('00', '01', '02', '03') AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2)) < 10 THEN '4 Years to less than 10 Years' WHEN DT_LIFEFLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG IS NULL AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2)) >= 10 THEN '10 Years or more and Less than Life' WHEN DT_LIFEFLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG IS NULL AND FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH IS NULL THEN 'No sentence' ELSE 'Not Categorised' END AS CURRENT_SENTENCE_LENGTH_BAND, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.PNC_ID, CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END AS DATE_OF_BIRTH, AT_DIM_OFFENCE.OFFENCE_SEVERITY_RANKING, AT_FACT_COURT_CHARGE.OFFENDER_CHARGE_ID_NK, AT_FACT_COURT_CHARGE.MOST_SERIOUS_FLAG, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.SSD, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_CODE, DT_ADMISSION.MOVEMENT_TIME, FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_RELEASE_DATE FROM BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENCE AT_DIM_OFFENCE, (SELECT ob.offender_id_display, fme.offender_booking_sk, est.establishment_code_nk, fme.to_location_sk, fme.from_location_sk, fme.from_location_type, MAX(fme.MOVEMENT_SEQ) AS MOVEMENT_SEQ, MAX(d.day_date) AS MOVEMENT_TIME, TRUNC(ETL.LOAD_END_DATETIME) AS LOAD_DATE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_MOVEMENT_EXTERNAL fme, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING ob, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT est, BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG ETL, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE d WHERE ob.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = est.ESTABLISHMENT_SK AND d.date_sk = fme.date_sk AND fme.offender_booking_sk = ob.offender_booking_sk AND ob.active_status IN ('Active In', 'Active Out') AND ob.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y' AND ob.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND ETL.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL) AND ob.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = fme.to_location_sk AND fme.movement_seq = (SELECT MAX(fme2.movement_seq) FROM BODIMIS.FACT_MOVEMENT_EXTERNAL fme2 WHERE fme.offender_booking_sk = fme2.offender_booking_sk AND fme2.direction_code = 'IN' AND fme2.TYPE = 'Admission' AND fme2.To_location_type = 'Establishment' AND fme2.reason_code <> 'R') GROUP BY ob.offender_id_display, fme.offender_booking_sk, est.establishment_code_nk, fme.to_location_sk, fme.from_location_sk, fme.from_location_type, ETL.LOAD_END_DATETIME) DT_ADMISSION, BODIMIS.FACT_COURT_CHARGE AT_FACT_COURT_CHARGE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_ASSESSMENT AT_CURRENT_SECURITY_CATEGORY, (SELECT DISTINCT BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE_TERM.offender_booking_sk, BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE_TERM.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG FROM BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE_TERM, BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE, BODIMIS.DIM_SENTENCE_STATUS dss WHERE (BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE.SENTENCE_STATUS_SK = dss.sentence_status_sk) AND dss.sentence_status = 'Active' AND (BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE_TERM.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE.SENTENCE_SEQ_NK = BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE_TERM.SENTENCE_SEQ_NK) AND (BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE.COURT_CASE_SK = BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE_TERM.COURT_CASE_SK) AND BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE_TERM.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG = 'Y') DT_LIFEFLAG, FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.DIM_COURT_CASE AT_COURT_CASE WHERE (AT_FACT_COURT_CHARGE.OFFENCE_SK = AT_DIM_OFFENCE.OFFENCE_SK (+)) AND (AT_COURT_CASE.COURT_CASE_SK = AT_FACT_COURT_CHARGE.COURT_CASE_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = DT_LIFEFLAG.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_COURT_CASE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK = AT_DOB.DATE_SK) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_COURT_CASE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IS NULL OR AT_COURT_CASE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = DT_ADMISSION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_CURRENT_SECURITY_CATEGORY.CURRENT_SEC_CAT_FLAG (+) = 'Y') AND (AT_CURRENT_SECURITY_CATEGORY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND ((AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Associated Establishment\Associated Establishment Code',mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */)) AND CASE WHEN DT_LIFEFLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN 'Life' WHEN SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2) = '99' THEN 'Life' WHEN FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH = '00/00/00' THEN 'No sentence' WHEN DT_LIFEFLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG IS NULL AND SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2) = '00' AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 4, 2)) < 6 THEN 'Less than 6 Months' WHEN DT_LIFEFLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG IS NULL AND SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2) = '00' AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 4, 2)) < 12 THEN '6 Months to less than 1 Year' WHEN DT_LIFEFLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG IS NULL AND SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2) <> '00' AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2)) < 2 THEN '1 Year to less than 2 Years' WHEN DT_LIFEFLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG IS NULL AND NOT SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2) IN ('00', '01') AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2)) < 3 THEN '2 Years to less than 3 Years' WHEN DT_LIFEFLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG IS NULL AND NOT SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2) IN ('00', '01', '02') AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2)) < 4 THEN '3 Years to less than 4 Years' WHEN DT_LIFEFLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG IS NULL AND NOT SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2) IN ('00', '01', '02', '03') AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2)) < 10 THEN '4 Years to less than 10 Years' WHEN DT_LIFEFLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG IS NULL AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, 1, 2)) >= 10 THEN '10 Years or more and Less than Life' WHEN DT_LIFEFLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG IS NULL AND FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH IS NULL THEN 'No sentence' ELSE 'Not Categorised' END <> 'No sentence' AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, CURRENT_SECURITY_CATEGORY, CURRENT_SENTENCE_LENGTH_BAND, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, PNC_ID, DATE_OF_BIRTH, OFFENCE_SEVERITY_RANKING, OFFENDER_CHARGE_ID_NK, MOST_SERIOUS_FLAG, FIRST_NAME, SURNAME, SSD, MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_CODE, MOVEMENT_TIME, CURR_RELEASE_DATE, DATE_COMPLETED AS V_DATE_COMPLETED_MGE, RISK_LEVEL_ AS V_RISK_LEVEL_MGE, FINDING_A_GOOD_PLACE_TO_LIVE_ AS V_Q1_MGE, 'TBD' AS V_Q2_MGE, KEEPING_TO_MY_PLANS_ AS V_Q3_MGE, DEALING_WITH_PEOPLE_IN_AUTHO33 AS V_Q4_MGE, GAMBLING_ AS V_Q5_MGE, MIXING_WITH_BAD_COMPANY_ AS V_Q6_MGE, BEING_BORED_ AS V_Q7_MGE, BEING_LONELY_ AS V_Q8_MGE, GOING_TO_PLACES_WHICH_CAUSE_39 AS V_Q9_MGE, TAKING_DRUGS_ AS V_Q10_MGE, DRINKING_TOO_MUCH_ALCOHOL_ AS V_Q11_MGE, LOSING_MY_TEMPER_ AS V_Q12_MGE, DOING_THINGS_ON_THE_SPUR_OF_39 AS V_Q13_MGE, REPEATING_THE_SAME_MISTAKES_ AS V_Q14_MGE, GETTING_VIOLENT_WHEN_ANNOYED_ AS V_Q15_MGE, READING_WRITING_SPELLING_AND37 AS V_Q16_MGE, GETTING_QUALIFICATIONS_ AS V_Q17_MGE, GETTING_A_JOB_ AS V_Q18_MGE, KEEPING_A_JOB_ AS V_Q19_MGE, MANAGING_MONEY_DEALING_WITH_34 AS V_Q20_MGE, GETTING_ON_WITH_MY_HUSBAND_W40 AS V_Q21_MGE, LOOKING_AFTER_MY_CHILDREN_ AS V_Q22_MGE, WORRYING_ABOUT_THINGS_ AS V_Q23_MGE, MAKING_GOOD_DECISIONS_ AS V_Q24_MGE, FEELING_DEPRESSED_ AS V_Q25_MGE, FEELING_STRESSED_ AS V_Q26_MGE, NOT_HAVING_A_PARTNER_ AS V_Q27_MGE, ARE_YOU_LIKELY_TO_OFFEND_IN_39 AS V_Q28_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q1_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q2_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q3_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q4_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q5_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q6_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q7_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q8_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q9_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q10_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q11_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q12_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q13_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q14_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q15_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q16_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q17_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q18_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q19_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q20_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q21_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q22_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q23_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q24_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q25_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q26_LINKED_MGE, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_ AS V_Q27_LINKED_MGE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: OASys
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT ASSESSMENT.DATE_COMPLETED, COUNT(DISTINCT OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID) AS COUNT_OF_OFFENDERS, OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.CONTROLLING_OWNER, SUBSTR(ASSESSMENT.CALC_HIGHEST_RISK, 4) AS RISK_LEVEL_, ASSESSMENT.CALC_MAPPA, REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.OFFENDER_MANAGER, ASSESSMENT.CALC_PURPOSE_OF_ASSMNT_GROUPS, CASE WHEN OFFENDER.PROLIFIC_OFFENDER = '1' THEN 'Yes' WHEN OFFENDER.PROLIFIC_OFFENDER = '0' THEN 'No' END AS PROLIFIC_OFFENDER, COALESCE(PURPOSE_OF_ASSESSMENT.DESCRIPTION, 'Not Specified') AS PURPOSE_OF_ASSESSMENT, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAF_HELP_NEEDED_TO_FILL_FORM = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAF_HELP_NEEDED_TO_FILL_FORM = 0 THEN 'No' END AS OFFENDER_NEEDED_HELP_TO_COMP37, ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.DATE_COMPLETED AS DATE_SAQ_COMPLETED, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ1_GOOD_PLACE_TO_LIVE = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ1_GOOD_PLACE_TO_LIVE = 0 THEN 'No' END AS FINDING_A_GOOD_PLACE_TO_LIVE_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ1_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ1_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ2_UNDERSTAND_FEELINGS = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ2_UNDERSTAND_FEELINGS = 0 THEN 'No' END AS UNDERSTANDING_OTHER_PEOPLE_S38, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ2_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ2_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ3_KEEPING_TO_PLANS = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ3_KEEPING_TO_PLANS = 0 THEN 'No' END AS KEEPING_TO_MY_PLANS_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ3_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ3_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ4_DEALING_WITH_PEOPLE = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ4_DEALING_WITH_PEOPLE = 0 THEN 'No' END AS DEALING_WITH_PEOPLE_IN_AUTHO33, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ4_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ4_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ5_GAMBLING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ5_GAMBLING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS GAMBLING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ5_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ5_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ6_BAD_COMPANY = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ6_BAD_COMPANY = 0 THEN 'No' END AS MIXING_WITH_BAD_COMPANY_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ6_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ6_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ7_BEING_BORED = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ7_BEING_BORED = 0 THEN 'No' END AS BEING_BORED_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ7_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ7_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ8_BEING_LONELY = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ8_BEING_LONELY = 0 THEN 'No' END AS BEING_LONELY_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ8_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ8_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ9_TROUBLE_WITH_PLACES = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ9_TROUBLE_WITH_PLACES = 0 THEN 'No' END AS GOING_TO_PLACES_WHICH_CAUSE_39, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ9_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ9_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ10_TAKING_DRUGS = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ10_TAKING_DRUGS = 0 THEN 'No' END AS TAKING_DRUGS_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ10_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ10_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ11_TOO_MUCH_ALCOHOL = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ11_TOO_MUCH_ALCOHOL = 0 THEN 'No' END AS DRINKING_TOO_MUCH_ALCOHOL_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ11_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ11_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ12_LOSING_TEMPER = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ12_LOSING_TEMPER = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LOSING_MY_TEMPER_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ12_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ12_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ13_SPONTANEOUS = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ13_SPONTANEOUS = 0 THEN 'No' END AS DOING_THINGS_ON_THE_SPUR_OF_39, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ13_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ13_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ14_REPEATING_MISTAKES = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ14_REPEATING_MISTAKES = 0 THEN 'No' END AS REPEATING_THE_SAME_MISTAKES_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ14_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ14_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ15_VIOLENT_WHEN_ANNOYED = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ15_VIOLENT_WHEN_ANNOYED = 0 THEN 'No' END AS GETTING_VIOLENT_WHEN_ANNOYED_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ15_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ15_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ16_LITERACY_NUMERACY = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ16_LITERACY_NUMERACY = 0 THEN 'No' END AS READING_WRITING_SPELLING_AND37, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ16_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ16_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ17_QUALIFICATIONS = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ17_QUALIFICATIONS = 0 THEN 'No' END AS GETTING_QUALIFICATIONS_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ17_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ17_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ18_FINDING_JOB = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ18_FINDING_JOB = 0 THEN 'No' END AS GETTING_A_JOB_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ18_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ18_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ19_KEEPING_JOB = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ19_KEEPING_JOB = 0 THEN 'No' END AS KEEPING_A_JOB_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ19_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ19_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ20_MANAGE_MONEY = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ20_MANAGE_MONEY = 0 THEN 'No' END AS MANAGING_MONEY_DEALING_WITH_34, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ20_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ20_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ21_PARTNER_RELATIONSHIP = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ21_PARTNER_RELATIONSHIP = 0 THEN 'No' END AS GETTING_ON_WITH_MY_HUSBAND_W40, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ21_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ21_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ22_LOOKING_AFTER_CHILDREN = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ22_LOOKING_AFTER_CHILDREN = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LOOKING_AFTER_MY_CHILDREN_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ22_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ22_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ23_WORRYING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ23_WORRYING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS WORRYING_ABOUT_THINGS_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ23_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ23_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ24_DECISION_MAKING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ24_DECISION_MAKING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS MAKING_GOOD_DECISIONS_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ24_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ24_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ25_DEPRESSED = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ25_DEPRESSED = 0 THEN 'No' END AS FEELING_DEPRESSED_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ25_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ25_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ26_STRESSED = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ26_STRESSED = 0 THEN 'No' END AS FEELING_STRESSED_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ26_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ26_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ27_NO_PARTNER = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ27_NO_PARTNER = 0 THEN 'No' END AS NOT_HAVING_A_PARTNER_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ27_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ27_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END AS LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ28_LIKELY_TO_OFFEND_AGAIN = 0 THEN 'Definitely not' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ28_LIKELY_TO_OFFEND_AGAIN = 1 THEN 'Unlikely' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ28_LIKELY_TO_OFFEND_AGAIN = 2 THEN 'Quite likely' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ28_LIKELY_TO_OFFEND_AGAIN = 3 THEN 'Very likely' END AS ARE_YOU_LIKELY_TO_OFFEND_IN_39 FROM ASSESSMENT, OFFENDER, REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY, PURPOSE_OF_ASSESSMENT, ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT WHERE (PURPOSE_OF_ASSESSMENT.PURPOSE_OF_ASSESSMENT_CODE (+) = ASSESSMENT.PURPOSE_OF_ASSESSMENT_CODE) AND (ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_ID = ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_ID) AND (OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = ASSESSMENT.OFFENDER_ID (+)) AND (OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.OFFENDER_ID (+)) AND (ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_ID IN (SELECT LAST_VALUE(ASSESSMENT.assessment_id) OVER (PARTITION BY ASSESSMENT.offender_id ORDER BY ASSESSMENT.date_completed rows BETWEEN CURRENT ROW AND UNBOUNDED following) AS last_ass_for_offender FROM ASSESSMENT, OFFENDER, REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY WHERE (OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = ASSESSMENT.OFFENDER_ID (+)) AND (OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.OFFENDER_ID (+)) AND (ASSESSMENT.single_date_completed = 'Y' AND completed_assessment <> 'Abandoned' AND NOT OFFENDER.Offender_id IS NULL) AND (COALESCE(ASSESSMENT.COMPLETED_ASSESSMENT, 'Not Specified') = 'True' AND OFFENDER.HISTORIC_OFFENDER_CALC = 'Current' AND (REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.LATEST_OWNERSHIP_RANK = 1) AND REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.PHYSICAL_LOCATION = (SELECT LOCATION FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Physical Location:','A','Offender History\Physical Location',Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */))) AND (REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.LATEST_OWNERSHIP_RANK = 1)) GROUP BY ASSESSMENT.DATE_COMPLETED, OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.CONTROLLING_OWNER, SUBSTR(ASSESSMENT.CALC_HIGHEST_RISK, 4), ASSESSMENT.CALC_MAPPA, REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.OFFENDER_MANAGER, ASSESSMENT.CALC_PURPOSE_OF_ASSMNT_GROUPS, CASE WHEN OFFENDER.PROLIFIC_OFFENDER = '1' THEN 'Yes' WHEN OFFENDER.PROLIFIC_OFFENDER = '0' THEN 'No' END, COALESCE(PURPOSE_OF_ASSESSMENT.DESCRIPTION, 'Not Specified'), CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAF_HELP_NEEDED_TO_FILL_FORM = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAF_HELP_NEEDED_TO_FILL_FORM = 0 THEN 'No' END, ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.DATE_COMPLETED, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ1_GOOD_PLACE_TO_LIVE = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ1_GOOD_PLACE_TO_LIVE = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ1_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ1_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ2_UNDERSTAND_FEELINGS = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ2_UNDERSTAND_FEELINGS = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ2_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ2_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ3_KEEPING_TO_PLANS = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ3_KEEPING_TO_PLANS = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ3_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ3_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ4_DEALING_WITH_PEOPLE = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ4_DEALING_WITH_PEOPLE = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ4_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ4_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ5_GAMBLING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ5_GAMBLING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ5_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ5_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ6_BAD_COMPANY = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ6_BAD_COMPANY = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ6_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ6_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ7_BEING_BORED = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ7_BEING_BORED = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ7_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ7_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ8_BEING_LONELY = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ8_BEING_LONELY = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ8_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ8_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ9_TROUBLE_WITH_PLACES = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ9_TROUBLE_WITH_PLACES = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ9_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ9_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ10_TAKING_DRUGS = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ10_TAKING_DRUGS = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ10_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ10_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ11_TOO_MUCH_ALCOHOL = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ11_TOO_MUCH_ALCOHOL = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ11_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ11_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ12_LOSING_TEMPER = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ12_LOSING_TEMPER = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ12_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ12_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ13_SPONTANEOUS = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ13_SPONTANEOUS = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ13_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ13_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ14_REPEATING_MISTAKES = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ14_REPEATING_MISTAKES = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ14_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ14_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ15_VIOLENT_WHEN_ANNOYED = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ15_VIOLENT_WHEN_ANNOYED = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ15_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ15_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ16_LITERACY_NUMERACY = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ16_LITERACY_NUMERACY = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ16_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ16_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ17_QUALIFICATIONS = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ17_QUALIFICATIONS = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ17_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ17_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ18_FINDING_JOB = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ18_FINDING_JOB = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ18_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ18_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ19_KEEPING_JOB = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ19_KEEPING_JOB = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ19_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ19_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ20_MANAGE_MONEY = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ20_MANAGE_MONEY = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ20_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ20_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ21_PARTNER_RELATIONSHIP = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ21_PARTNER_RELATIONSHIP = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ21_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ21_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ22_LOOKING_AFTER_CHILDREN = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ22_LOOKING_AFTER_CHILDREN = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ22_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ22_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ23_WORRYING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ23_WORRYING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ23_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ23_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ24_DECISION_MAKING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ24_DECISION_MAKING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ24_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ24_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ25_DEPRESSED = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ25_DEPRESSED = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ25_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ25_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ26_STRESSED = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ26_STRESSED = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ26_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ26_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ27_NO_PARTNER = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ27_NO_PARTNER = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ27_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ27_LINKED_TO_OFFENDING = 0 THEN 'No' END, CASE WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ28_LIKELY_TO_OFFEND_AGAIN = 0 THEN 'Definitely not' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ28_LIKELY_TO_OFFEND_AGAIN = 1 THEN 'Unlikely' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ28_LIKELY_TO_OFFEND_AGAIN = 2 THEN 'Quite likely' WHEN ASSESSMENT_SELF_ASSESSMENT.SAFQ28_LIKELY_TO_OFFEND_AGAIN = 3 THEN 'Very likely' END), dataset_ AS (SELECT DATE_COMPLETED, COUNT_OF_OFFENDERS, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, CONTROLLING_OWNER, RISK_LEVEL_, CALC_MAPPA, OFFENDER_MANAGER, CALC_PURPOSE_OF_ASSMNT_GROUPS, PROLIFIC_OFFENDER, PURPOSE_OF_ASSESSMENT, OFFENDER_NEEDED_HELP_TO_COMP37, DATE_SAQ_COMPLETED, FINDING_A_GOOD_PLACE_TO_LIVE_, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, UNDERSTANDING_OTHER_PEOPLE_S38, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, KEEPING_TO_MY_PLANS_, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, DEALING_WITH_PEOPLE_IN_AUTHO33, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, GAMBLING_, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, MIXING_WITH_BAD_COMPANY_, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, BEING_BORED_, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, BEING_LONELY_, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, GOING_TO_PLACES_WHICH_CAUSE_39, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, TAKING_DRUGS_, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, DRINKING_TOO_MUCH_ALCOHOL_, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, LOSING_MY_TEMPER_, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, DOING_THINGS_ON_THE_SPUR_OF_39, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, REPEATING_THE_SAME_MISTAKES_, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, GETTING_VIOLENT_WHEN_ANNOYED_, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, READING_WRITING_SPELLING_AND37, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, GETTING_QUALIFICATIONS_, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, GETTING_A_JOB_, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, KEEPING_A_JOB_, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, MANAGING_MONEY_DEALING_WITH_34, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, GETTING_ON_WITH_MY_HUSBAND_W40, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, LOOKING_AFTER_MY_CHILDREN_, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, WORRYING_ABOUT_THINGS_, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, MAKING_GOOD_DECISIONS_, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, FEELING_DEPRESSED_, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, FEELING_STRESSED_, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, NOT_HAVING_A_PARTNER_, LINKED_TO_OFFENDING_, ARE_YOU_LIKELY_TO_OFFEND_IN_39 FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)
